info.title: PattView Wii
info.author: Vash
info.details:
PattView Wii
Animal Crossing: City Folk Pattern Editor

Created by Vash
www.Game-Hackers.com

The long-awaited arrival of PattView right on your Wii console!
This build offers a plethora of new features to allow for the
best pattern designs right from the comfort of your couch.

Also, check out PattViewX, available for purchase at Game-Hackers.com!
